title: Chilli Garlic Penne Pasta 🌶 | Brown Rice Quinoa Penne Pasta 🍝
content:
Breakfast recipe: Chilli Garlic Penne Pasta  Servings : 2 Duration : 20 minutes A plate of vegetables including healthiness with spice,  sauces and these are rolled up in Brown Rice Quinoa Penne Pasta which turned out delicious 😋 Easy and quick breakfast any body can cook, one has to follow the steps and clear process shared below. Let’s start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Brown Rice quinoa Penne Pasta - 1 cup
  • Butter - 1 Tb sp
  • Carrot - 1 - chopped
  • Beans - 5 - chopped
  • Capsicum - 1/4 cup - Diced
  • Broccoli - Florets - 8
  • Ginger Garlic Paste - 1 tsp
  • Red chilly sauce - 2 Tb sp
  • Salt - 1/2 tsp
  • Tomato Sauce - 1 Tb sp
  • Water - 500 ml - to cook pasta and 1/2 tsp salt
Procedure: Cooking Pasta:
  • Heat a bowl of water with salt on medium heat
  • Let the water start boiling
  • Add Penne Pasta
  • Stir and cook for 10 minutes or till Penne cooked well
  • Strain water and keep aside
Chilli Garlic Penne Pasta:
  • Add butter on medium heated frying pan
  • Then add carrot, beans and sauté two minutes
  • Next add chopped Capsicum and broccoli
  • Saute 2 minutes and add salt, red chilly sauce, ginger garlic paste and tomato sauce
  • Combine well and add cooked pasta
  • Toss pasta or gently combine well, stir more 2 minutes
  • Chilli Garlic Penne Pasta is ready to serve, to enjoy the taste it’s best to serve hot 🙂
  • Happy cooking and enjoy your day 😃
